Name: Taurian Guards
Details: The Taurian Guards is a Taurian Concordat BattleMech line Regiment.  The Taurian Guards were created by combining several senior Regiments that had been decimated by the fighting during the Reunification War.  One of the most celebrated Regiments in the Taurian Defense Force, they are currently assigned to the Taurian Guards Corps and stationed on the capital planet itself.
